name: Zapdos

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

flavorText: A legendary bird Pok√©mon said to appear from clouds while wielding enormous lightning bolts.

strengths: 90 HP is excellent for a Basic
weaknesses: Thunder has self-damage risk on tails
Thunderbolt discards ALL energy - one-shot only
synergies: Super Energy Retrieval - Mass energy recovery after Thunderbolt
counters: Energy Removal - Prevent Zapdos from attacking
Gust of Wind - Force out before ready

competitiveHistory: Zapdos was one of the premier Basic Pokemon in early competitive play. No weakness was extremely rare and valuable, and 90 HP on a Basic was excellent. Thunder provided solid damage output while Thunderbolt served as a nuclear option to KO anything. Often splashed as a 1-2 copy in various decks.

rulings.ruling: Thunder's self-damage only occurs on a tails flip.
Thunderbolt requires you to discard ALL Energy cards attached to Zapdos - you cannot use it if you're unwilling to discard.
After using Thunderbolt, Zapdos has no energy and cannot attack until re-energized.
Zapdos has no weakness - this is printed on the card. It does not have a weakness to any type.
